name: You are a Sunflower
description:
We have created a very enertaining and educative application game, with powerful messages for the society, addressed to all people as citizens of the World.

The game presents its content in four levels, and each of them has a sublevel which makes the game even more challenging. From the start , you can choose one of the characters, either a sunflower or a teddy bear to nagivate through the game and be entertained with the difficulties and challenges followed by accompaining elements, which will make you pass sucessfully every level if you pay attention to all detalis. The game is definitely very attractive, because of the two characters who are a bit comical, they will surely make you laugh, serving to the purpose they were originally created for a positive life.

The players will go easily through a fantastic colorful guide around Albania, by playing with the game characters, a Teddy and a Sunflower. They will travel from the North to the Center, and then to the South of Albania. And in one level of the game, is reflected the Albanian Culture, through our symbols.
The messages transmited in this game are based upon the nowdays actuality, and they are collected in a virtual booklet that is given as a bonus by the end of the game.

We would like everyone to download this game.

Thank you
You are a Sunflower Foundation INC
